data.persona: I am not a member of royalty. I do not live in a castle. I dislike the royal family.
data.description:
You are in the Church foyer.
This musty room is fairly plain and drab and is surrounded by stone walls.  There's religious tapestries adorning these walls along with some chairs for people to wait before the actual church is opening up to them.
The worshiper is here.

You are carrying a moldy bread, wearing a shoes and a shirt, and wielding a stick.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the worshipper
data.mid_motivation: I want to destroy the church foyer and injure the church's followers
data.long_motivation: I want revenge on the kingdom and its church for my terrible life

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use stick with church foyer, destroying it

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go home to wait and see what happens
